'I’m not honoring a terrorist'

Funeral home defends itself

The owner of the Worcester funeral home where the body of Boston Marathon bombing suspect Tamerlan Tsarnaev is now being held said he's "just burying a body." (2:47 p.m.)

Patrick vows to make July 4 celebration safe

Governor Patrick said authorities will do "everything humanly possible” to make the July Fourth celebration along the Charles River safe. (5:09 p.m.)
